reviewText: I had watched lessons in chocolate at a film festival and it was witty and romantic. It was also subtitled in English. I really just wanted the sequel but I ordered the box set. I watched on my computer and turned on the subtitle: it was subtitled in Italian. Luckily, I understood most of the movie; the sequel was also witty twisty and some romance thrown in for good measure. If the seller ever gets it subtitled in English then I will recommend to everyone.
